name: Gerald MISTICH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Mistich v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Gerald MISTICH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of March, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, and the matter is remanded for reconsideration in light of Martin v. PBPP, 840 A.2d 299 (Pa.2003). Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
845 A.2d 814
Gerald MISTICH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 29, 2004.
